inclusion.criterion: Patient is 18 years old and older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presenting with acute sickle cell crisis pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pain described as diffuse throughout the body or localized to joint/extremity/back
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Describes pain to be greater than or equal to 2 on the NRS
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Standard therapy plan is not morphine or dilaudid
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a known history of sickle cell disease and presents with severe bone pain. The patient's symptoms are consistent with acute sickle cell crisis pain.
